snippet.title: Nintendo Badge Arcade - Trailer (Nintendo 3DS)
snippet.description:
Nintendo Badge Arcade comes to Nintendo eShop for Nintendo 3DS on 13/11/2015!

Collect badges based on Nintendo games and series and decorate your HOME Menu with them. You can start playing Nintendo Badge Arcade for free, or you can use Nintendo eShop funds to purchase additional plays, allowing you more turns on the badge catchers and more opportunities to collect badges.

Each day you will receive five free plays on the practice catcher. The practice catcher is stocked with dummy badges that aren’t added to your collection but may even come with a bonus or super bonus that will earn you free plays on the badge catchers! Using the practice catcher regularly will improve your skills, and you’ll also get one free play for every 10 non-bonus dummy badges you collect.

Official Website:  https://www.nintendo.co.uk

Facebook Nintendo 3DS: https://facebook.com/Nintendo3DS
Twitter Nintendo UK: https://twitter.com/NintendoUK
Twitch Nintendo UK: https://twitch.tv/NintendoUK
Instagram Nintendo UK: https://instagram.com/NintendoUK
YouTube Nintendo UK: http://ow.ly/pcJxF
